title: UNICEF urges media, stakeholders to counter vaccine misinformation
description:
UNICEF calls on media and stakeholders to lead health education to counter rising vaccine misinformation surrounding polio and other health interventions.

Read More: https://punchng.com/unicef-urges-media-stakeholders-to-counter-vaccine-misinformation/
content: The United Nations Childrens Fund has urged media organisations and other critical stakeholders to take the lead in health education and community enlightenment, particularly in rural areas, to count… [+2886 chars]
